document.full_text: twenty-five years after his inspiring masters win at the ripe age of 46, jack nicklaus struck another blow for aging golfers on thursday by ripping a drive up the fairway to start the 2011 championship.
document.title: nicklaus celebrates masters anniversary with opening drive
lines_and_colors: twenty-five years after his inspiring masters win at the ripe age of 46, jack nicklaus struck another blow for aging golfers on thursday by ripping a drive up the fairway to start the 2011 championship.
